name: Feline Files
description:
Feline Files! 

Lore 

Play as a photographer determined to capture pictures of elusive ghostly cats! Cats are not known for being the most cooperative creatures in the world however, so you’ll have to use the notes you have on each cat to figure out how to appease the feline spirits and get them to act friendlier around you. 

Gameplay 

There are three total maps, and four cat types, each with their own personalities, likes and dislikes, and “cures” that aid in the process of getting them to appear for you. At first, they will move around the map invisibly, only showing signs of their presence via meows, ghostly paw prints and hairballs, scratch marks appearing on furniture out of nowhere, and sudden drops in temperature. As you use these signs alongside your notes, you will piece together what cat type you are dealing with, and how to appease each one. 

Controls 

WASD- Movement 

Right-Click- UV 

E- Interact 

1-3- Select Tools 

4-6 Select Objects 

Left-Click- Use Selection 

Credits
